property.name: loadGeneFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.gene_item g JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id WHERE g.gene_item_id = ?

property.name: loadGeneFilesQuery
property.value:

g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.gene_item g JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id WHERE g.gene_item_id IN @in@

property.name: loadAllGeneFilesQuery

g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,

property.name: createGeneFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.gene_item ( gene_item_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id, compressed, external_db_type_id, external_db_id, external_db_organism) VALUES ( :GENE_ITEM_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID, :COMPRESSED, :EXTERNAL_DB_TYPE_ID, :EXTERNAL_DB_ID, :EXTERNAL_DB_ORGANISM)
